title: Considering Ranked Play- Serious Mature People Only!
body:
Hi all, as some of you know ive been around brushing up my skills and deciding what champs are really in my click now with my current set up.

Currently i feel my strongest two roles are;

Top; Xin Zhao{{champion:5}} 
Mid; Malzahar{{champion:90}} (before and after 6.9 patch, not a flavor of the month choice) 

Other viable and solid roles include:
Adc; Kog'maw 
Support; Volibear/Morgana 

I do not in any way consider myself to ever be an option for jg, i dont enjoy it, it's not my play strength or preference.

I do play other champs but they are my main 4 that i've really noticed a huge consistent click with

feel free to check match history with Xin, i feel i'm fairly consistently broken with him, i have been up to Diamond 2 previously on my original account on NA until stopping in s4 when Lucien was released. 

No i don't play him to the moba recommendations, yes my history shows my build preferences, i strategizewith team, non-salty, admit my mistakes and all in all try to have fun whilst moving forward, i prefer encouraging to discouraging and dont see a bad day as a sign that you suck, we all have them, myself included. 

Im in Sydney Australia and play either very early mornings or evenings generally. 

If you have any questions hit me up,

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/132845780/201724307

latest Xin performance. History has another 4 games similar to it.

Talk to you soon guys,

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

Breaking League of Legends, 
One Xin Zhao victory at a time.

latest retarded game breaker....

Add me in game IGN: Qilli, I aim to break the meta with teemo jg/top/mid/adc/supp

Add me in game 
IGN: The Gingninj69 
be sure to play with you for some serious ranked play

tossing you a request, by serious, yeah im serious, but im not a raging toxic elitist also :) Just, people who can think outside the meta and realize the meta can be broken by intelligent and creative play. Not all people are capable of such, will look for you in the morning/day time on tuesday, this afternoon will not be the best display (new meds mess my head up and trialing a new cocktail)

bumped- happy to accept 1v1 duels to prove my Xin knowledge and skills and discuss the why's i play him like i do. 
Alot of math (exactly, not quite but within 95% accurate and close, enough to know how strong i really am), strategy consideration, technique play and how to read moments in lanes to know when my best moments are to fight and how to set up etc, how to switch to lane roaming, counter jungling from my lane etc.

Don't be shy, i don't bite. 

Though i will say, if you're struggling already in the bronze/silver and haven't been above... I'm not the player for your team, i'm not exactly willing to train a team on map awareness, strategy to the game, how to evolve your style and item builds to suit situations rather than "this is the most OP". You need to change as the game changes, if you can't you will be capitalized upon and be the reason we lose, i don't have that much patience to keep explaining what you're doing wrong over and over. I'm happy to instruct, there's alot of knowledge, im happy to lose to see constant improvements, but if you can't see your mistakes as you make them, admit them and try to learn from it. I'm really not the player for you.

edit; please don't try to justify to me why Xin should be in jungle instead. Do the maths, on hit Xin Zhao jungle build is actually weaker.
